Package com.opengamma.strata.pricer.credit

Class AnalyticSpreadSensitivityCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opengamma.strata.pricer.credit.SpreadSensitivityCalculator
      • com.opengamma.strata.pricer.credit.AnalyticSpreadSensitivityCalculator
  • public class AnalyticSpreadSensitivityCalculator
extends SpreadSensitivityCalculator
    Analytic spread sensitivity calculator.

    This analytically computes the present value sensitivity to par spreads of bucketed CDSs.

        Computes parallel CS01 for CDS.

        The relevant credit curve must be stored in RatesProvider.
